Detailed Description

Path class.

Description:
The Path class provides file path name services.
API Stability:
Prototype
See also:
EjsFile ejsCreatePath ejsIsPath

Function Documentation

EjsFileSystem* ejsCreateFileSystem ( Ejs *  ejs,
cchar *  path 
)

Create a FileSystem object.

Description:
Create a file system object associated with the given pathname.
Parameters:
ejs Ejs reference returned from ejsCreate
path Path to describe the file system. Can be any path in the file system.
Returns:
A new file system object

EjsPath* ejsCreatePath ( Ejs *  ejs,
cchar *  path 
)

Create a Path object.

Description:
Create a file object associated with the given filename. The filename is not opened, just stored.
Parameters:
ejs Ejs reference returned from ejsCreate
path Path file name
Returns:
A new Path object

bool ejsIsPath ( Ejs *  ejs,
EjsObj *  vp 
)

Determine if a variable is a Path.

Parameters:
ejs Ejs reference returned from ejsCreate
vp Variable to test
Returns:
True if the variable is a Path
